    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Upgrade fix script to copy records in Space shift to Location shift</description>
        <name>Copy Space shift to Location shift</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[copySpaceShift2LocationShift();
function copySpaceShift2LocationShift() {
	WPLogger.info('copySpaceShift2LocationShift', 'Starting fix script to copy records in Space shift to Location shift');
	if (gs.tableExists(WPConstants.TABLES.M2M_SPACE_SHIFT)) {
		var spaceShiftGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.M2M_SPACE_SHIFT);
		spaceShiftGr.query();
		
		while (spaceShiftGr.next()) {
			var locationShiftGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.M2M_LOCATION_SHIFT);
			locationShiftGr.initialize();
			locationShiftGr.location = spaceShiftGr.space;
			locationShiftGr.shift = spaceShiftGr.shift;
			locationShiftGr.active = spaceShiftGr.active;
			locationShiftGr.sys_domain = spaceShiftGr.sys_domain;
			locationShiftGr.insert();
		}
	}
	
	WPLogger.info('copySpaceShift2LocationShift', 'Finishing fix script to copy records in Space shift to Location shift');
}]]></script>
